item.title: Shyam Benegal, a giant of Indian cinema, passes away at 90 - The Hindu
item.description:
Shyam Benegal, a Giant of Indian Cinema, Passes Away at 90

Date & Source: December 23, 2024 - The Hindu

Filmmaker Shyam Benegal, a towering figure in Indian cinema and a leading force behind the Parallel Cinema movement, has passed away at the age of 90 due to kidney-related ailments in Mumbai.

  • Benegal was renowned for his impactful films such as Ankur, Nishant, Mandi, Manthan, and Zubeidaa.
  • He addressed critical social issues, including feudalism and women’s rights, and experimented with cinematic form.
  • His daughter confirmed his death, citing chronic kidney disease as the cause.
  • Naseeruddin Shah expressed deep gratitude for Benegal’s mentorship and support throughout his career.
  • He directed notable biopics and received numerous accolades including the Padma Shri and Padma Bhushan.
“It is impossible to describe in a few words what Shyam meant to me.” - Naseeruddin Shah

Shyam Benegal's legacy will continue to inspire future filmmakers and audiences around the world.

item.title: Pushpa 2 The Rule stampede: Producer of Allu Arjun film donates ₹50 lakh to victim's family - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pushpa 2 The Rule Stampede: Producer Donates ₹50 Lakh to Victim's Family

Publication Date: Dec 23, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The producer of the film Pushpa 2, Naveen Yerneni, has donated ₹50 lakh to the family of a victim who lost her life in a tragic stampede during the film's premiere.

  • Allu Arjun had previously donated ₹25 lakh to the same family.
  • Director Sukumar contributed ₹5 lakh to the victim's family.
  • The stampede occurred on the premiere eve, resulting in the death of a woman and critical injuries to her young son.
  • Naveen Yerneni expressed his condolences and commitment to support the victim's family.
  • In a response to the incident, Allu Arjun's residence was vandalised, leading to police action.
"It's very unfortunate what happened. Revathi's death is a huge loss to her family." - Naveen Yerneni

This tragedy has sparked controversy and highlighted the responsibilities of those involved in large public events. The attention from the media and the public is likely to continue as the impacts of the incident unfold.

item.title: Shyam Benegal, India's Parallel Cinema Pioneer, Dies At 90 - NDTV Movies
item.description:
Shyam Benegal, India's Parallel Cinema Pioneer, Dies At 90

Publication Date: December 15, 2023

Source: PTI

Shyam Benegal, a seminal figure in Indian parallel cinema, passed away at the age of 90 in Mumbai, leaving a significant legacy in filmmaking known for realism and social commentary.

  • Shyam Benegal died on December 14, 2023, after suffering from chronic kidney disease.
  • He was hospitalized in the intensive care unit at Wockhardt Hospital just days after his 90th birthday.
  • His daughter confirmed that he had been ill for several years but was still working on multiple projects.
  • Benegal's last film was the biographical 'Mujib: The Making of a Nation' released in 2023.
  • Known for classic films like 'Bhumika', 'Manthan', and 'Junoon', he is a pivotal figure in Hindi cinema.
“I'm working on two to three projects; they are all different from one another.” - Shyam Benegal on his 90th birthday.

Shyam Benegal's contributions to parallel cinema have left an indelible mark on Indian culture, promoting realism and important social issues through his work.

item.title: Filmmaker Shyam Benegal passes away - The Indian Express
item.description:
Shyam Benegal, the Force Behind India's Parallel Cinema Movement, Dies at 90

Publication Date: Recent, Source: Indian Express

Shyam Benegal, a pioneering figure in India's parallel cinema movement, passed away at the age of 90, leaving behind a legacy of impactful films and television shows.

  • Benegal made his debut with the acclaimed film Ankur in 1974, critiquing social issues in India.
  • He directed several landmark films such as Nishant, Manthan, and Bhumika.
  • His body of work includes significant television series like Bharat Ek Khoj.
  • Benegal introduced assertive female characters and showcased the talents of actors like Naseeruddin Shah and Shabana Azmi.
  • Despite facing criticism, he continued to create meaningful cinema until his late career.
“Shyam Benegal’s movies and aesthetics played a major role in the parallel cinema movement of the 70s and 80s.”

His films remain influential and relevant, impacting both audiences and subsequent filmmakers.

item.title: Deepika Padukone-Ranveer Singh introduce daughter Dua to paps at private event. See photos - The Indian Express
item.description:
Deepika Padukone-Ranveer Singh introduce daughter Dua to paps at private event. See photos

Date: December 2024 | Source: The Indian Express

After nearly four months since their daughter’s arrival, Bollywood actors Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone hosted an event to introduce their daughter, Dua, to the paparazzi.

  • This was the couple's first public appearance since their daughter’s birth in September.
  • They requested that photographers refrain from taking Dua's pictures.
  • Deepika wore a beautiful beige long dress, and Ranveer donned a white co-ord set.
  • Ranveer was seen affectionately kissing Deepika on the cheek during the event.
“The couple announced their pregnancy in February.”

The introduction of Dua follows similar events by other Bollywood couples, highlighting a trend of public figures managing their children’s exposure to media.

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office collection: Allu Arjun film crosses Rs 1600 crore worldwide, targets Baahubali 2 and - DNA India
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Surpasses Rs 1600 Crore Worldwide

Publication Date: December 23, 2024 | Source: DNA India

Pushpa 2: The Rule continues to dominate the box office, becoming the third highest-grossing Indian film of all time with a worldwide collection exceeding Rs 1600 crore.

  • Allu Arjun stars in the sequel, reprising his role as Pushpa Raj.
  • The film has surpassed Baahubali 2 and Dangal, which are the only ones to gross higher.
  • It has been well-received by critics and audiences alike.
  • The film's competition includes the upcoming release Baby John.
  • Pushpa 2's duration of 3 hours and 20 minutes has received mixed reviews.
“Pushpa 2 will now face competition from Varun Dhawan's action-packed drama Baby John.”

The film marks a notable achievement in Indian cinema, setting the stage for its upcoming sequel, Pushpa 3: The Rampage.

item.title: Fateh trailer: Sonu Sood channels desi John Wick, promises sleek action in his directorial debut. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Fateh trailer: Sonu Sood channels desi John Wick, promises sleek action in his directorial debut. Watch

Date: Dec 23, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The trailer for the upcoming action thriller Fateh, marking Sonu Sood's directorial debut, has been released, showcasing intense action and promising high-octane sequences.

  • Fateh features Sonu Sood on a mission to save Jacqueline Fernandez from the Chinese cyber mafia.
  • The trailer includes gripping action sequences with Sood demonstrating his physical prowess.
  • Fan reactions draw parallels with popular action films like John Wick, with many anticipating its success.
  • The film is set to hit theaters on January 10, 2025.
“John Wick vibes.” - YouTube user reaction

As excitement builds for Fateh, it holds significant promise as a thrilling addition to Bollywood's action genre.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Worldwide Box Office (18 Days): Beats Salman Khan’s No.1 Grosser & Ranbir Kapoor’s Animal, Needs 67.85 Crores To Create History! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Worldwide Box Office (18 Days): Beats Salman Khan’s No.1 Grosser & Ranbir Kapoor’s

Publication Date: Recently

Source: Koimoi

Pushpa 2 has taken the box office by storm, emerging as the fourth highest-grossing Hindi film ever, surpassing major hits like Bajrangi Bhaijaan and Animal in just 18 days.

  • The film has grossed 932.15 crore worldwide.
  • It earned 692.50 crore net in India.
  • It is expected to join the 1000 crore club soon.
“Whenever it happens, the Allu Arjun starrer will become the first Hindi-dubbed film from the South to score 1000 crores globally.”

This monumental success highlights the film's widespread appeal and strong performance in the Hindi market.

item.title: BRS vs Congress intensifies after vandalisation at Allu Arjun's house; all 6 accused get bail - The Times of India
item.description:
BRS vs Congress intensifies after vandalisation at Allu Arjun's house; all 6 accused get bail

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

The political tensions between BRS and Congress have escalated following the vandalisation of actor Allu Arjun's house. All six accused in the case have been granted bail, raising questions about political motives and justice.

  • Vandalisation incident at Allu Arjun’s residence has sparked political controversy.
  • All six individuals accused of the vandalism have received bail.
  • The incident has heightened the ongoing rivalry between BRS and Congress parties.
"This incident emphasizes the need for accountability and justice within our political system." - Anonymous source

The situation is evolving, and stakeholders are calling for a thorough investigation into the matter.

item.title: Picture of the day: Ram Charan & NTR meet in Dubai - 123telugu
item.description:
Ram Charan and NTR Meet in Dubai

Published on Dec 23, 2024

Music director Thaman shares a delightful picture with Tollywood stars Ram Charan and NTR in Dubai.

  • The photograph showcases the camaraderie between the stars after a long time.
  • Ram Charan was in Dubai for the Game Changer pre-release event.
  • This unexpected meeting has delighted fans and rekindled memories from their film RRR.
“#Dhop MOMENT 🔥 WHAT FUNNNNNNNNN !! It’s all BROTHER LOVE ❤️” — Thaman S

This meeting has generated excitement among fans as it reflects the close bond between these leading actors.

item.title: Picture of the day : Ram Charan & NTR bump into each other in Mumbai - 123telugu
item.description:
Picture of the day: Ram Charan & NTR meet in Dubai

Published on Dec 23, 2024 4:59 pm IST

Music director Thaman has surprised netizens by sharing a heartwarming picture featuring Telugu cinema stars NTR and Ram Charan. Fans expressed their delight as the duo had not been photographed together since their film RRR.

  • The photo was taken after the USA pre-release event of Game Changer.
  • NTR was in Mumbai for the War 2 shoot when they met.
  • Thaman referred to the moment as the “Dhop” moment, capturing the trio's smiles.

#Dhop MOMENT 🔥 @tarak9999 @AlwaysRamCharan
WHAT FUNNNNNNNNN !!
It’s all BROTHER LOVE ❤️ pic.twitter.com/qlUNXMPg5Z

— thaman S (@MusicThaman) December 23, 2024

This joyful reunion is generating excitement among fans and reviving memories of their collaboration in RRR.

item.title: Boney Kapoor misses wife Sridevi after undergoing weight loss: ‘She was always after me to lose weight’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Boney Kapoor misses wife Sridevi after undergoing weight loss: ‘She was always after me to lose weight’

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: Indian Express

Boney Kapoor shares his emotional journey of losing weight, revealing how his late wife Sridevi inspired him to pursue a healthier lifestyle. With his transformation, he reflects on the pride she would have felt.

  • Boney Kapoor has lost 14 kgs and aims to lose another 8-9 kgs.
  • He feels motivated by Sridevi's memory during his weight loss journey.
  • He credits Sridevi for encouraging him to adopt a healthier lifestyle.
  • At 69, he acknowledges the importance of health and appearance.
  • Sridevi passed away in 2018; they were married in 1997 and have two daughters.
“I feel my wife is still around me and motivating me,” said Boney Kapoor.

This transformation has not only improved his health but also symbolizes the enduring love and influence of his late wife, who always pushed him towards better health.

item.title: Sanjay Leela Bhansali’s 'Love and War' adds Orry to star-studded cast, set for March 2026 release' - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Sanjay Leela Bhansali’s 'Love and War' adds Orry to star-studded cast, set for March 2026 release

Publication Date: TBD Source: Times of India

The upcoming film 'Love and War' by Sanjay Leela Bhansali will feature social media sensation Orry among a stellar cast that includes Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt. The movie is scheduled for release on March 20, 2026.

  • Orry, also known as Orhan Awatramani, joins the cast, adding excitement to this star-studded film.
  • The film features Ranbir Kapoor and Vicky Kaushal as officers in the Indian Armed Forces.
  • Alia Bhatt will play a cabaret dancer while Orry plays her closest friend who is gay.
  • Deepika Padukone will make a special cameo, marking another collaboration with Bhansali.
“Already the movie features a star-studded cast, a great storyline, and Bhansali's vision. 'Love and War' is already the most awaited film in 2026.”

With its grand storytelling and elaborate visuals expected, 'Love and War' promises to add another significant film to Bhansali's esteemed body of work upon its release in March 2026.

item.title: Ram Kapoor’s body transformation, his photos then and now - The Indian Express
item.description:
Ram Kapoor's Incredible Body Transformation: Then and Now

Updated: December 23, 2024 | Source: Indian Express

Ram Kapoor has captured everyone's attention with his remarkable body transformation after returning to social media.

  • At 51 years old, Ram surprised fans by showcasing his stunning weight loss.
  • He revealed a weight loss of 42 kg through an Instagram post featuring a note, '42 Kapoor'.
  • Comments from fans express awe and admiration for his dedication and transformation.
  • Despite the positive reactions, some fans miss his previous look from his popular show.
“This is the outcome of endurance and determination,” wrote a fan, praising Ram's transformation.

Ram's transformation story serves as an inspiration for many, highlighting the impact of hard work and commitment.

item.title: Jhanak's Krushal Ahuja reacts on show taking a leap: 'The way story is..' - India Forums
item.description:
Krushal Ahuja Addresses Rumors of Jhanak Taking a Five-Year Leap

Published: Monday, December 23, 2024 at 10:28 AM

In an exclusive interview, Krushal Ahuja, the lead actor of Star Plus' Jhanak, spoke about the recent rumors regarding the show taking a five-year leap. Ahuja clarified that no such leap has been officially announced.

  • Jhanak, starring Hiba Nawab and Krushal Ahuja, has been a hit on Star Plus.
  • Rumors about the show taking a five-year leap have disappointed fans.
  • Krushal Ahuja stated that there has been no official announcement about a leap.
  • The show has recently seen a decline in TRP ratings, currently falling out of the top 5.
''We have not been informed about anything of this sort yet. There has been no official announcement about this to us by the production. The way the story is proceeding currently, I do not think that this leap may happen any time soon.''

Overall, Krushal Ahuja’s comments provide reassurance to fans concerned about the future direction of Jhanak and suggest that no major changes are imminent.

item.title: PMF 48: Garividi Lakshmi begins with a pooja ceremony - 123telugu
item.description:
PMF 48: Garividi Lakshmi begins with a pooja ceremony

Published on: Dec 23, 2024 4:00 pm IST

Noted Telugu producer Vishwa Prasad of People Media Factory has announced an exciting new project titled Garividi Lakshmi, starring Anandhi and marking Gowri Naidu Jammu's directorial debut.

  • The film is the 48th project from People Media Factory.
  • It was launched in a grand ceremony in Adoni, Andhra Pradesh, attended by the cast and crew, attracting a massive crowd.
  • The film tells the inspiring story of Burra Katha artist Garividi Lakshmi, addressing women's identity theft.
  • Key roles will be played by Raasi, Rag Mayur, Sharanya Pradeep, and others.
  • It marks the producer debut of TG Krithi Prasad, daughter of TG Vishwa Prasad.
  • J. Aditya is the cinematographer, and Charan Arjun is responsible for the music.
“This bold initiative has been praised by veteran actor Naresh and MLA Pardhasaradhi, reflecting the makers’ confidence in the project.”

More details about the film are expected soon.

item.title: Allu Arjun stampede case: Telugu actor Rahul Ramakrishna retracts his statements - India Today
item.description:
Rahul Ramakrishna Retracts Statements on Allu Arjun Stampede Case

Published On: Dec 23, 2024

Source: India Today

Telugu actor Rahul Ramakrishna has stated on social media that he will take back his previous remarks regarding the Allu Arjun stampede incident, citing a lack of information about the events that unfolded.

  • Rahul Ramakrishna retracted his statements, indicating he was uninformed about the circumstances surrounding the incident.
  • The stampede occurred during the premiere of Pushpa 2 on December 4, resulting in the death of a woman and injuries to her son.
  • Ramakrishna had previously criticized the police for their handling of the crowd during the event.
  • Allu Arjun was arrested in connection with the stampede and granted bail after one night in custody.
  • The incident has garnered significant media attention and public discussion, raising questions about responsibility and safety at events.
“I take back my statements that I made previously.” - Rahul Ramakrishna

The retraction of statements comes amidst ongoing controversies surrounding the event and calls for accountability from various parties involved.

item.title: Vivek Oberoi says he’s madly in love with wife Priyanka Alva: ‘Among all the women in the universe, I would only choose her’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Vivek Oberoi says he’s madly in love with wife Priyanka Alva: ‘Among all the women in the universe, I would only choose her’

Date: 2023-12-14 | Source: The Indian Express

In a recent conversation, actor Vivek Oberoi expressed his enduring love for his wife Priyanka Alva, reflecting on their 14-year marriage and the simple gestures that keep their relationship strong.

  • Vivek spoke about the evolution of romantic gestures over the years, moving from grandiosity to meaningful simplicity.
  • He recalled a romantic proposal in Florence that solidified his feelings for Priyanka.
  • Vivek emphasized the importance of respect and commitment in marriage, especially in setting an example for their children.
  • He shared his belief in exclusive relationships, expressing confusion over the concept of open marriages.
  • Oberoi includes daily affirmations of love, asking himself if he would choose Priyanka again, always confirming his choice.
“Among all the woman in the universe, would I still choose her? ... It is the most liberating feeling.”

Vivek sees his relationship with Priyanka as a constant source of happiness and fulfillment, highlighting that her only request is for his time together.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Salman Khan and Hrithik Roshan join hands for the first time onscreen for.. - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Salman Khan and Hrithik Roshan Partner for First Ever Ad Film

Published on: Dec 23, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

Salman Khan and Hrithik Roshan are collaborating for the first time in an action-packed advertisement for a leading brand, directed by Ali Abbas Zafar.

  • This collaboration marks the first onscreen appearance of both superstars together.
  • The advertisement will be shot in Mumbai with VFX backgrounds to enhance production value.
  • Ali Abbas Zafar and Salman Khan have previously collaborated on successful projects.
  • Official announcement regarding the collaboration is expected soon.
“After all the efforts for a big screen collaboration, it’s a corporate that got the two superstars together for an action-packed advertisement.”

This collaboration is highly anticipated by fans, with hopes of a feature film in the future.

item.title: Rahul Vaidya reacts to being blocked by Virat Kohli on Instagram; says, 'I still don't understand why' - The Times of India
item.description:
Rahul Vaidya reacts to being blocked by Virat Kohli on Instagram; says, "I still don't understand why"

Publication Date: December 11, 2024 | Source: Times of India

In an unexpected revelation, singer Rahul Vaidya shared that he has been blocked by Indian cricket star Virat Kohli on Instagram. The singer expressed his confusion about the situation, stating that he doesn't understand why Kohli decided to block him.

  • Rahul Vaidya was surprised to learn he was blocked on Instagram by Virat Kohli.
  • He expressed his bafflement, saying: "Aaj tak samajh mein nahi aaya, bhai ne block kyun kiya" (I still don't understand why he blocked me).
  • Rahul Vaidya is a known singer and a celebrity known for his appearances on Indian Idol and Bigg Boss 14.
  • Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma celebrated their seventh wedding anniversary on December 11, 2024, and are reportedly planning to move to London with their children.
“Aaj tak samajh mein nahi aaya, bhai ne block kyun kiya” - Rahul Vaidya

This unexpected incident has stirred curiosity among fans regarding the relationship between the two celebrities.

item.title: Congress denies link to vandalism at Pushpa 2 actor Allu Arjun's residence in Hyderabad: Report - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Congress Denies Any Link to Vandalism at Allu Arjun's Residence

Date: December 23, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The Congress party has denied allegations of involvement in the vandalism at actor Allu Arjun's residence in Hyderabad, following a stampede incident during the premiere of his film, Pushpa 2.

  • The vandalism occurred amid protests outside Allu Arjun's house in response to the Sandhya Theatre stampede incident that resulted in a woman’s death.
  • Congress spokesperson Sama Ram Mohan Reddy clarified that none of the accused are affiliated with the party.
  • Telangana CM Revanth Reddy condemned the attack and called for strict action from law enforcement.
  • Protesters identified as students from Osmania University allegedly caused damage to Allu Arjun's property.
“I condemn the attack on the homes of film celebrities. I am directing the State DGP and City Police Commissioner to take strict action regarding law and order.” - Revanth Reddy

The incident highlights ongoing tensions and the dissatisfaction among certain groups following the tragic events at the theatre.

item.title: Meet Kanchan Joshi, first wife of Zomato founder Deepinder Goyal, whom he chased for six months, got married, - India.com
item.description:
Meet Kanchan Joshi, the First Wife of Zomato Founder Deepinder Goyal

Publication Date: Not specified Source: India.com

Deepinder Goyal, the visionary CEO of Zomato, shares his love stories with Kanchan Joshi and Grecia Muñoz, reflecting his relentless pursuit of happiness and companionship.

Key Points:

  • Kanchan Joshi and Deepinder Goyal met at IIT Delhi while pursuing their studies.
  • Deepinder chased Kanchan for six months before they started dating and got married in 2007.
  • Deepinder co-founded Zomato in 2008, and they had a daughter named Sitara in 2013.
  • Kanchan is now a respected Assistant Professor of Mathematics at Delhi University.
  • Deepinder later married Grecia Muñoz, a former Mexican model.

Notable Quotes:

“I chased her for six months.” - Deepinder Goyal
“We understand each other very well. We haven’t fought in years.” - Deepinder Goyal

The journey of Deepinder Goyal and Kanchan Joshi illustrates their personal growth, with Kanchan achieving significant academic success while Deepinder flourishes in business.

item.title: Allu Arjun Issue: Chiranjeevi‘s Influence Not Working? - M9
item.description:
Chiranjeevi's Influence Weakened in Allu Arjun Crisis

Publication Date: December 2024

Source: M9 News

Allu Arjun finds himself in a troubling situation following the Sandhya Theater stampede, facing a backlash from both the government and the police.

  • Allu Arjun's recent arrest has intensified scrutiny from political figures.
  • Telangana Chief Minister Revanth Reddy has criticized Arjun and his supporters, implementing stricter regulations on ticket pricing and showtimes.
  • Chiranjeevi's political influence is questioned, as his efforts appear ineffective in assisting Allu Arjun.
  • The situation raises concerns regarding the safety of Allu Arjun amid public and political pressures.
“Revanth Reddy will not stop until he wins this Ego Battle.”

The unfolding drama suggests significant political and social ramifications for Allu Arjun and the film industry in Telangana.
